objects.draw

Class RouteShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.draw.RouteShape

  • public class RouteShape
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents set of functions added to given Route which allows to draw it in ImgPlane. his class is practically drawable shape of the given Route.
    Author:
    Martin Hamet

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Class represents states in which can be route highlighted

      • addLineToShape

        private void addLineToShape(TimeStamp ts1,
                            TimeStamp ts2,
                            javafx.scene.Group shape)
        Adds line (path) from TimeStamp ts1 to TimeStamp ts2 on position coresponding to coordinates of those two given TimeStamps. Line is colored and scaled for route to home or route to target accordingly. Those colors add up when overlapped Created line and possible shadow for TimeStamp with loading action is added to given Group.
        Parameters:
        ts1 - start of line
        ts2 - end of line
        shape - created shape is added to this Group
